member.name: T:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiMessageRouting
member.summary: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer (e.g. PartnerId, ConiziId...)

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiMessageRouting.PartnerId
member.summary: Partner Id is used to identify the real sender or receiver (e.g. 1234)

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiMessageRouting.EdiId
member.summary: Edi Id is used to identify the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiMessageRouting.ConiziId
member.summary: Conizi Id is used to identify the sending or receiving Tenant/Site/App on the conizi platform

member.param: The name of the property as string
The value of the property as string
